title: The Wizard and The Curse-breaker
description: The course of sixteen-year-old Zoe’s life alters drastically after a love spell backfires and causes the death of her childhood sweetheart. Three years later she’s on the road, alone, and making a living as a curse-breaker.Aiden Divine’s bones creak, his hair (what he has left of it) is white, and he’s wishing for an end to it all. He once was the youngest High Wizard in history. Now he’s twenty-five in a ninety-year-old man’s body and resigned to the fact that his curse is unbreakable.A sudden storm, a chance encounter, and mistaken identities lead Aiden and Zoe on a wild goose chase around the countryside in pursuit of the one person who can break Aiden’s curse. Zoe.
author: Annalisa Gulbrandsen
